name: @iamsquare/footballapi
description: Copy football-data.org api data to local database

scripts.docker:rm: npm run docker:kill && docker rm footballapi
scripts.docker:exec:prod: npm run docker:up:prod && docker exec footballapi
scripts.docker:exec:dev: npm run docker:up:dev && docker exec footballapi
scripts.start: npm run docker:create:dev && node -r dotenv/config bin/scrapeApi.js
scripts.prod: npm run docker:create:prod && node -r dotenv/config bin/scrapeApi.js

author: squaremarco
